title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.3 - Final date for payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.3 - Final date for payment

State Regulations

Each milk dealer shall pay for all milk purchased or
received from another milk dealer on or before the 20th day of the month
following the month in which the milk was purchased or received. If the
commissioner fixes an earlier final date for payment by a milk dealer to a
cooperative association of producers which is also a milk dealer with respect
to milk subject to regulation under a marketing order promulgated pursuant to
the provisions of section
258-m
or
258-n
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, such earlier date of payment shall be effective under this Part for milk
purchased from such cooperative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
44.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
